It wasn‚Äôt enough that the universe said we would be born on the exact same day of the exact same year. It wasn‚Äôt enough for us to get matching first tattoos (I know I wimped out but I got it eventually) and then again more matching tattoos when we were 30. It wasn‚Äôt enough to be the high priestess at your wedding. Or for you to be the maid of honor at mine. And this year when we were celebrating our daughters first birthday your son entered the world. So now they will get to walk this wild and wonderful path together. Just one day and one year apart. Talk about some weird cosmic balance. There is no amount of you @ladyluofthewolves that would suffice to be ‚Äúenough‚Äù for me. I am constantly wanting more, more, more. That‚Äôs just what a beautiful incredible soul you are. I feel so blessed to have you in my life. And Watching you with your son is one of the greatest pleasures i have ever known. Love you sister. Happy birthday to us.
Some days are damn near perfect.

I know every human being is unique and singular, but sometimes someone comes along who shines so bright you cannot turn away. Alex. You are a force. And we are all like moths to your flame. from the moment you came into my life my days and nights have been filled with more laughter, more dancing and more joy (not to mention amazing dresses and wine) happiest of birthdays, beautiful. May this year be the best one yet. #disconeverdies
Just dreaming of living my best life...

These past 365 days have been the most challenging, hilarious, sleepless, giggle filled, food-on-the-floor, heart-beating-out-of-my-chest, WONDERFUL, life-changing days I have ever experienced. Our daughter, Aurora is 1 year old today and she has already filled @halfadams and me with more joy and gratitude than our souls can handle. All I want to do is return the favor, but the world we are giving her isn‚Äôt the world we grew up in. The oceans aren‚Äôt the same, the ice caps, the amazon rainforest, the hurricanes are more destructive, the summers burn hotter, the winters are colder, the animals are disappearing, the coral reefs bleaching, the very air we breathe is different.. changing in crisis. So today for your birthday, my daughter, I am making a promise. Confronting climate change has to be a priority. For me and for our family. A daily fight. A monthly donation. At the front of our minds.... If you want to join me and wish her a happy birthday please consider following @fridaysforfuture and jointing the strikes OR joining me in donating some money (even a dollar a month!) to @nrdc_org or @davidsuzukifdn or any environmental fund that you love! This isn‚Äôt my world anymore. It‚Äôs hers. And it has to go better. I have to do better. üåéüåçüåè (check out my link in bio for an easy connection to donate)

A decade, an epoch practically unheard of in television. That is how long @suits_usa has been a part of my (and all of our lives.) I will never forget the first time I said goodbye to @halfadams I watched him pack his bag (after I tried to fit myself in it) and we talked about how scary and exciting it all was and what it would be like... how could we ever possibly know... One visit to NYC and a million more to Downsview Toronto later and this show has changed my life. Dear suitors you have always welcomed me with loving arms. Dear incredible cast and crew of suits you let me sleep, eat and live (and even act) in your workspace and i am so indebted to you for it. And dear Patrick. Watching you create the beautiful beating bleeding heart that is Mike Ross is something I will never forget. You poured your talent, your blood and your soul into this show. You stepped into the role of director with total ease. And you created a character that will go down in tv history. It was never easy to say goodbye to you year after year to watch you return to Suits (in fact it was probably some of the hardest work I‚Äôve ever had to do), but I am so grateful for everything I learned in the process and the family we built because of it.

This is my friend, Mackenzie Davis. She is a badass- Like Terminator level badass. She is also an incredible woman and an advocate for other women and young women. To support the charity @onegirlcansociety she is auctioning tickets for YOU to attend the #terminatordarkfate premiere WITH HER! I‚Äôm putting the link in my bio if you want to bid on it AND check out the charity! ‚ù§Ô∏èüë©üèΩüë©üèº‚Äçü¶∞üí™üèº
Happy birthday @jclosefaction you are where Canada meets LA.

i carry your heart with me(i carry it in
my heart)i am never without it(anywhere
i go you go,my dear;and whatever is done
by only me is your doing,my darling) i fear
no fate(for you are my fate,my sweet)i want
no world(for beautiful you are my world,my true)
and it‚Äôs you are whatever a moon has always meant
and whatever a sun will always sing is you

here is the deepest secret nobody knows
(here is the root of the root and the bud of the bud
and the sky of the sky of a tree called life;which grows
higher than soul can hope or mind can hide)

i carry your heart(i carry it in my heart)
When it‚Äôs a full moon you better charge those crystals for @ladyluofthewolves

This is a photo of me and my werk husband @jclosefaction who heard me tell a story that was bouncing around in my head and made it become our first pilot. He‚Äôs the other Canadian good boy in my life and he always shows me love, support and a better wine choice. Also sometimes I think Bea loves him more than she loves me. Happiest of birthdays ya goof. Gawd, am I lucky to call you friend.

Patrick, Little One, Love of my life and now, Pa Pa... this year has been the most incredible yet. Watching you become a father is one of the highlights of my life because it comes to you so effortlessly and naturally. You‚Äôre working in 3 cities, on 2 jobs and raising one incredible little girl and every bit of it you do with grace and love. May this spin around the sun bring you more good health, good times, light and laughter than you know what to do with. I can‚Äôt wait to love you through every minute of it. Love,Ya waffe

The lungs of the Earth are in flames. üî• The Brazilian Amazon‚Äîhome to 1 million Indigenous people and 3 million species‚Äîhas been burning for more than two weeks straight. There have been 74,000 fires in the Brazilian Amazon since the beginning of this year‚Äîa staggering 84% increase over the same period last year (National Institute for Space Research, Brazil). Scientists and conservationists attribute the accelerating deforestation to President Jair Bolsonaro, who issued an open invitation to loggers and farmers to clear the land after taking office in January.‚Å£
‚Å£
The largest rainforest in the world is a critical piece of the global climate solution. Without the Amazon, we cannot keep the Earth‚Äôs warming in check. ‚Å£
‚Å£
The Amazon needs more than our prayers. So what can YOU do?‚Å£
‚Å£
‚úî As an emergency response, donate to frontline Amazon groups working to defend the forest. ‚Å£
‚úî Consider becoming a regular supporter of the Rainforest Alliance‚Äôs community forestry initiatives across the world‚Äôs most vulnerable tropical forests, including the Amazon; this approach is by far the most effective defense against deforestation and natural forest fires, but it requires deep, long-term collaboration between the communities and the public and private sectors.
